pages.text: $(marked)Everchanging Moss$() is a Rite Material of Life, and an important ingredient, too.$(br)$(o)It feels squishy$()

Everchanging Moss is created with rather bloody means.$(br)In order to create it, one must slay a living being with a $(l:shaping/entry_dagger)Sacrificial Dagger$() on a patch of $(l:vitalis/entry_moss)Moss$(). $(br)This will taint the patch in blood and imbue it with the soul of the victim.$(br)The moss can simply be harvested to yield results.
